price: Аллоҳ. Ундан ўзга илоҳ йўқдир. Гўзал номлар Уникидир.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
